thread.title: T. B. Bartrum
thread.title_full: Biblio.com reviewed by T. B. Bartrum

author: T. B. Bartrum
title: T. B. Bartrum
text:
Biblio displayed an add for a novelist I had not read yet...Don Winslow.
So I read some reviews and purchased eight. Biblio was fast in delivery, low price, thus I was able to buy eight Winslow novels and am going to buy all that Biblio has by Don Winslow in stock. I can't wait!!!
T. B. Bartrum
